docs.text: warning : contains what the matrix is .

docs.text: rated r for sci-fi violence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: starring : keanu reeves , laurence fishburne , joe panteliano
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some may be disappointed with the matrix .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i'll tell you i was .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i sat there and sat there and sat there waiting for something to happen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now wait wait , i know most of you loved it , and i'm not saying i didn't like it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what i'm saying is the first half was extremely slow .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now seeing the trailer it makes you think the whole entire movie is one big special effects show .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: don't be fooled , this movie has a big story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and big chunks of talky moments .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but i will admit the special effects and the acting were above par , deserving the rating above .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ok now to the story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: well this may take a while .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ok first of all , our world we live in now , is not the real world , actually we live inside a computer generated world known as the matrix .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a man played by keanu reeves is about to find that out , when is kidnapped and almost coaxed to go into the real world .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he does so , and finds out that he can do anything , be anything he wants to be .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but he has to fight a 'matrix skipping' bad guy , who wants to send him back to his own world or destroy him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: laurence fishburne , his guide of sorts plays his character well as does keanu reeves .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but i sat in the theatre for over and hour wondering where all the special effects were .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yeah there were some in the first half but not enough .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the trailer for this movie was really decieving making people think that this was a special effects laden movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now for the second half , it is explosive , and saves the movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some of the special effects and fighting were breathtaking .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the sound , the music , and all the effects were effective , and the last hour kept us entertained .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but with a running time of 2 hours and 20 minutes , this movie is at least 40 minutes too long .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one would have wished for a better 'matrix' , but i do have to say , i did like it and i was entertained .
docs.label: positive
